file_content.text: I received your message. My name is Solash. Do you have the Eidolon?
Do you have my money?
Credits, first.
Of course. The Cartel always honors its bounties.
Yeah, and he's drekking heavy.
Unless I'm gaining weight.
It must be the carbonite. It adds a few kilos.
Are Hutts fat?
Yeah, yeah, I got him.
The important ones usually are.
I must ask. Why have you succeeded where so many others have failed so miserably? Who exactly are you?
I'm just a bounty hunter.
A professional.
A rather exceptional one, I'd say. The Cartel will be watching your career with great interest.
I'd say it was pure talent.
I'm just a brilliant stranger.
Well, I cannot argue with your results.
I have your promised bounty--and well deserved, too. Please consider spending some of it in our wonderful casinos. Good day, hunter.
Now that you've got him, what are you going to do with him?
What happens to the Eidolon?
Tight-lipped, hmm? Fair enough. He'll go on display for a few months. Then be thawed and tortured.
When the Hutts tire of this sport, he'll be executed in the most painful way we can conceive. Then his remains will be fed to vrblthers.
We'll make sure no one is ever foolish enough to strike at the Cartel again. Good day, hunter.
